materials.raw_text:
- Chromium(II) oxide (CrO) - 40.0 g 
 - Mercury(II) oxide (HgO) - 22.0 g 
 - Sodium chloride (NaCl) - 12.0 g 
 - Water (H2O) - 50.0 g

sourcing.instructions:
- Chromium(II) oxide can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online retailers like Sigma-Aldrich.
 - Mercury(II) oxide is available from specialty chemical suppliers.
 - Sodium chloride can be found in any grocery store.
 - Distilled water can be obtained from supermarkets or pharmacies.

preparation.raw_text:

 2. Add 22.0 g of Mercury(II) oxide to the beaker.
